nodes.name: sap.uiext.inbox.Inbox
nodes.description: A comprehensive UI design approach with graphical and functional elements for search tasks, filter tasks, and take actions on the tasks ("Inbox Pattern").

parameters.name: oSorter
parameters.description: {}Predefined sorter that is applied to the Task Collection before displaying the tasks in the Inbox. By default the tasks are sorted on 'CreatedOn' , descending, according to TCM. The sorter is not validated for the path being a valid TCM Entity Property. The sorter passed will be applied to the oData service as is. In case the entity Property in the path is a sortable property on the UI, the sorter indicator for that property will be visible.
